response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its high value and unique features, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your business or lifestyle. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $10,000. This price reflects its exceptional quality and the potential return on investment. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of facilitating this transaction for you.", "product_price": 10000}
